name: Paint Panic!
description:
You're stuck in a cursed easel - avoid and shoot falling paint to create platforms to escape to the top!

Controls: 

  • MOVE: A & D or left/right arrow keys
  • Jump: W or up arrow key
  • Shoot: space bar

This is currently just a rough prototype/first level of a game; however, I do plan on polishing it and adding more levels.
